markdownRemark.html:
Just jotting down some random thoughts / ideas here

I think it might be possible! There is a listener plugin, which could log actions / events to a remote server. Playback would probably be best done with either Selenium or Windmill.

A proxy listener could also be setup with nanoserv or similar...

jQuery + Selenium

These two don't seem to get along too well, which is too bad.
